revised_title: Obituary of Philip Bruce White: A Pioneering Bacteriologist
tldr: The obituary of Philip Bruce White, a renowned bacteriologist, highlights his significant contributions to the study of Salmonella and cholera vibrio, as well as his work in the field of immunology and epidemiology. White's early interest in biology and his experimental approach led him to become a prominent figure in the world of bacteriology. His life and career are remembered fondly by those who knew him, as he made a lasting impact on the field and inspired future generations of researchers.
